Bundle.description: A container for a collection of resources.

id.description: The logical id of the resource, as used in the URL for the resource. Once assigned, this value never changes.

meta.description: The metadata about the resource. This is content that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

implicitRules.description: A reference to a set of rules that were followed when the resource was constructed, and which must be understood when processing the content. Often, this is a reference to an implementation guide that defines the special rules along with other profiles etc.

language.description: The base language in which the resource is written.

identifier.description: A persistent identifier for the bundle that won't change as a bundle is copied from server to server.

type.description: Indicates the purpose of this bundle - how it is intended to be used.

timestamp.description: The date/time that the bundle was assembled - i.e. when the resources were placed in the bundle.

total.description: If a set of search matches, this is the total number of entries of type 'match' across all pages in the search.  It does not include search.mode = 'include' or 'outcome' entries and it does not provide a count of the number of entries in the Bundle.

link.description: A series of links that provide context to this bundle.

entry.description: An entry in a bundle resource - will either contain a resource or information about a resource (transactions and history only).

signature.description: Digital Signature - base64 encoded. XML-DSig or a JWT.
